TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVbcHostObject4 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost, class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject, class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject2, class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject3

summary.span: 定義 Vbc 工作用來與 IDE 通訊的介面。

span.span: Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE.

summary.span: 特別是，Vbc 工作會將實際編譯委派給 IDE，而不是 shell 輸出至命令列編譯器。

span.span: In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command-line compilers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetVBRuntime(string VBRuntime) cil managed
Public Function SetVBRuntime (VBRuntime As String) As Boolean

param.name: VBRuntime
param.span: Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫的名稱。

span.span: The name of the Visual Basic Runtime Library.

summary.span: 定義 Vbc 工作用來與 IDE 通訊的介面。

span.span: Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE.

summary.span: 特別是，Vbc 工作會將實際編譯委派給 IDE，而不是 shell 輸出至命令列編譯器。

span.span: In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command line compiler.

returns.span: 如果方法成功則傳回 ，否則傳回 。
